    • calculateUserNetWorth

      public BigDecimal calculateUserNetWorth(UUID userId)
      Calculates the net worth for a specific user by summing asset values. WARNING: This method directly sums values and does NOT perform currency conversion. Use calculateUserNetWorthInBase for a currency-converted sum.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The raw sum of current values of the user's assets.

    • calculateUserNetWorthInBase

      public BigDecimal calculateUserNetWorthInBase(UUID userId, String baseCurrencyCode)
      Calculates the total net worth of a user's assets, converted to a specified base currency.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      baseCurrencyCode - The currency code (e.g., "USD", "EUR") to convert all asset values to.
      Returns:
      The total net worth in the specified base currency. Returns BigDecimal.ZERO if user has no assets or if conversion fails for all assets.

    • calculatePerformance
